description.originalText:
I have had the pleasure of knowing and working with Gloria for the past seven years, during which she has been an integral part of our familyâ€™s life, caring for my two children.

She is exceptionally reliable and punctual. We have always been able to count on her to be on time and fulfill her duties with a high level of responsibility.

One of her standout qualities is her ability to engage with my children. She fosters a nurturing environment and connects with them on a personal level, providing meaningful interactions that support their growth and development.

She demonstrates remarkable adaptability when faced with unexpected situations.

The safety and well-being of my children are always her top priorities. I have complete confidence in her ability to provide a safe and caring environment, and her attention to detail in this regard is greatly appreciated.


She has been a wonderful addition to our family, and her dedication and skills have made a significant positive impact on our lives. I wholeheartedly recommend her to anyone seeking a dependable, caring, and skilled caregiver.
